title: American Federation of Arts: Mexican Art
description: This exhibit was created through the cooperation of The American Federation of Arts and the Mexican government to give the American public an opportunity to know Mexican art in its many forms. The exhibition, featuring works by artists Diego Rivera, Francisco Díaz de León, José Miguel Covarrubias Duclaud, Agustín Lazo Adalid, José Clemente Orozco, and David Alfaro Siqueros, aimed to present a Mexican interpretation of Mexico though early and contemporary applied arts, early fine arts, and contemporary fine arts.

input: American Federation of Arts: Mexican Art
